# isWindowLoaded

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the nib file containing the receiver’s window has been loaded.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isWindowLoaded: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the nib file containing the receiver’s window has been loaded, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.

## Loading and Displaying the Window

- **loadWindow()**: Loads the receiver’s window from the nib file.
- **showWindow(_:)**: Displays the window associated with the receiver.
- **window**: The window owned by the receiver.
- **windowDidLoad()**: Sent after the window owned by the receiver has been loaded.
- **windowWillLoad()**: Sent before the window owned by the receiver is loaded.
